name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: CD Projekt RED's third Witcher combines the series' non-linear storytelling with a sprawling open world that concludes the saga of Geralt of Rivia.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: God of War
description: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: One of the launch titles of the original Xbox, Halo: Combat Evolved is a sci-fi first-person shooter telling the tale of an advanced cybernetic super-soldier known as the "Master Chief".

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: One of the launch titles of the original Xbox, Halo: Combat Evolved is a sci-fi first-person shooter telling the tale of an advanced cybernetic super-soldier known as the "Master Chief".

name: Advanced Tactics Gold
description: Advanced Tactics Gold is a turn-based tactical wargame with an endless number of scenarios thanks to its random game mode and scenario editor.

name: League of Legends
description: A free-to-play competitive MOBA game with a large following in eSports. From the original developers of DotA: Allstars, the game expands the gameplay found in DotA by adding persistent Summoner profiles and a variety of original champions who fight for you on the battlefield against bots or one another.

name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
description: Counter-Strike gets a updated look (thanks to a series of development teams) in this 2004 update, adding updated graphics, new bots, and two unique single-player campaigns.

name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
description: Counter-Strike gets a updated look (thanks to a series of development teams) in this 2004 update, adding updated graphics, new bots, and two unique single-player campaigns.

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
description: The fourth iteration of Valve's team-based modern-military first-person shooter, rebuilt and constantly expanded for competitive play with new maps, new weapons, and new gameplay mechanics. It was later made free-to-play and most versions were later replaced with the sequel.

name: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike 2 brings twenty years of Counter-Strike experience into Source 2 Engine.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds
description: A survival-shooter led by the modder behind the Battle Royale mods for the ArmA series. It is one of the progenitors of the "battle royale" sub-genre, pitting 100 players in a large empty location where they must scavenge for weapons and fight to the death.

name: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Tapout
description: This is a game based on the sport of MMA.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown
description: The fourth mainline game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is a competitive multiplayer first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft Montreal. Players chose from a large roster of Operators with their own weapons and abilities to win round-based attack and defend matches.

name: Fortnite
description: Originally a co-operative looter shooter from the studios behind Unreal Tournament and Gears of War, Fortnite became one of the most successful PvP "battle royale" games and later became its own platform for several types of games.

name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring by FromSoftware is a collaboration between Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R.R. Martin.

name: Dark Sun: Shattered Lands
description: Dark Sun: Shattered Lands was released in 1993 and is the first Dungeons and Dragons game to use the Dark Sun campaign setting. While fairly obscure outside of enthusiast circles, it is praised for its tactical, turn-based combat.

name: Jurassic Park: Survival
description: Planned to coincide with Jurassic Park 3, Survival was to see players take on dinosaurs and terrorists alike as they fought to escape Isla Sorna. The game, however, quickly went extinct.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
description: An adventure/brawler based on Journey to the West and other Chinese literature and myth

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle follows the titular character on his journey to discover the mysterious "Great Circle" and stop the villainous forces trying to exploit its power in a globetrotting action-adventure game from the makers of Wolfenstein.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action role-playing game by CD Projekt RED based on the pen and paper RPG Cyberpunk 2020.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description:
An ancient evil has returned to Baldur's Gate, intent on devouring it from the inside out. 
Combat is Turn-based instead of Real-Time with Pauses style combat as previous main installments in the Baldur's Gate series

name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
description: An action-adventure game in the Star Wars series from the studio behind the Titanfall series, following a Jedi Padawan who turns fugitive after escaping the Jedi Purge.

name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: A sequel to Hollow Knight following the adventures of Hornet.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action role-playing game by CD Projekt RED based on the pen and paper RPG Cyberpunk 2020.
